metadata.title: CVE-2023-30085 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability found in Libming swftophp v.0.4.8 allows alocal attacker to cause a denial of service via the cws2fws function inutil/decompile.c.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
